entries: You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.
You have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC while wearing this armor.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.

You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to all attack, damage, and healing rolls made using this magic focus. Additionally, you have a {=bonusSpellSaveDc} bonus to your Spell Save DC on spells cast using this focus.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.
You have a +1 bonus to all checks made using this magic instrument. If you are a bard and proficient with the instrument, it counts as a +1 arcane focus for you.

magicvariant.name: Shield (*) +1
entries: {@note * This generic variant has the same name and source as the item {@item shield +1|owl}}.

While holding this shield, you have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC. If the shield has the ability to parry, it gains a {=bonusAc} bonus to the result of any parrying roll made by it.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.

While holding this shield, you have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC. If the shield has the ability to parry, it gains a {=bonusAc} bonus to the result of any parrying roll made by it.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.
You have a +1 bonus to all checks made using this magic tool. If you are an artificer and proficient with the tool, it counts as a +1 arcane focus for you.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.
You have a {=bonusWeaponAttack} bonus to attack rolls made with this weapon.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.

magicvariant.name: Adamantine Ammunition +1
entries: Ammunition made of adamantine is capable of going to a net of -1 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Ammunition made of adamantine have an increased chance to score a critical hit that scales with the enchantment bonus of the weapon used.

Ammunition made of adamantine is capable of going to a net of -1 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Ammunition made of adamantine have an increased chance to score a critical hit that scales with the enchantment bonus of the weapon used.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.

This suit of armor is reinforced with adamantine, enabling it to go to a net of 9 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Adamantine Armor has a passive DR against non-magical physical damage depending on their weight class, that scales with their enchantment bonus.
You have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC while wearing this armor.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.

This focus is made of adamantine, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Adamantine focuses have an increased chance to score a critical hit when used as a weapon that scales with their enchantment bonus.

You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to all attack, damage, and healing rolls made using this magic focus. Additionally, you have a {=bonusSpellSaveDc} bonus to your Spell Save DC on spells cast using this focus.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.
